channel.title: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week #17 - Winner Announced
channel.description:
<big> **====> ‚ì£—èùìê·∂ú“ú œÉùñã ùê≠‚íΩ·∫∏ ÔΩó—î‚Ç¨–∫** </big>
**‚ì¶hat happens?** > * Each week a new topic (like this one) is posted in the #contests category. > * If you want your track considered for track of the week, just post a Soundcloud link to your track below, before the due date listed at the bottom of this topic. > * The winner will be announced here at the end of the week.
**‚ì°ules:** >1. Track must be made by the submitter, using Auxy. >2. There are no set themes. Any genre. Any tempo. Any automations. >3. Tracks must be 60-seconds or longer. >4. Tracks can't have been posted previously. This competition is for new releases. >5. One entry per person, per week. >6. No collabs or remixes. >7. You can edit your post during the week if you make updates to your submission. >9. External samples can be used for individual instruments or vocals only ie: not sections of sampled music or drum loops. >10. Project files won't be considered. Soundcloud links only. >11. Late entries won't be considered. Enter in the next week instead. >12. Please also create a thread for your track under #tracks, like usual, if you wish.
**‚ìôudging:** One winner chosen each week, or possibly a draw. Judging will be totally subjective. Please don't ask why your track didn't win. The judges alternate between: -
* ICSleepers * Arimyth * Hydrans * AzureOnyx * Goxenar * Blakaz * DadMother * MisterMaster
The judge this week is... MisterMaster.
**‚ìürize** * Winner gets a special üíø icon next to their forum name. * Winner's name is also listed in a [winner's thread](https://disco.auxy.co/t/auxy-forum-track-of-the-week-winners/15961).
![Auxy%20Track%20of%20the%20Week|350x350,100%](upload://ia7OKbSnziVU4UHv8vbhMQqNOQx.jpeg) <small>*Logo created by @Arimyth </small>

item.title: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week #17 - Winner Announced
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
The entries this week were all fun to listen to. It was quite difficult to choose the winner.

BobTheGuyyyyy‚Äôs submission was up first and set the bar high, with ‚Äòfault‚Äô. 6 mins and 38 seconds of skills. Lovely piano. The likely winner, presumably.

Fuujiya gave us smooth trap beats with his dreamy track, Dreamcast.

WYA77 stepped onto the stage with purple hair, white shades and a fun submission about tomatoes.

Dadmother dropped a metal piece, Ebb and Flow. Not your typical Auxy music.

Octave‚Äôs track had a groovy almost old-school intro and was really easy to listen to.

KheeshKP served up some hot Chicken Noodle Soup trap, with a YouTube visualisation.

I really liked Jax‚Äôs entry, which was stripped back to just what‚Äôs needed. And a strong hook.

In the end, I couldn‚Äôt choose a single winner, so I‚Äôve chosen two - Congrats to BobTheGuyyyyy and Dadmother, for co-winning Track of the Week.

And others were very close to being selected.

Read full topic

item.title: Auxy Forum - Track of the Week #17 - Winner Announced
item.dc:creator: MisterMaster
item.description:
====> ‚ì£—èùìê·∂ú“ú œÉùñã ùê≠‚íΩ·∫∏ ÔΩó—î‚Ç¨–∫

‚ì¶hat happens?

  • Each week a new topic (like this one) is posted in the #contests category.
  • If you want your track considered for track of the week, just post a Soundcloud link to your track below, before the due date listed at the bottom of this topic.
  • The winner will be announced here at the end of the week.

‚ì°ules:

  1. Track must be made by the submitter, using Auxy.
  2. There are no set themes. Any genre. Any tempo. Any automations.
  3. Tracks must be 60-seconds or longer.
  4. Tracks can‚Äôt have been posted previously. This competition is for new releases.
  5. One entry per person, per week.
  6. No collabs or remixes.
  7. You can edit your post during the week if you make updates to your submission.
  8. External samples can be used for individual instruments or vocals only
    ie: not sections of sampled music or drum loops.
  9. Project files won‚Äôt be considered. Soundcloud links only.
  10. Late entries won‚Äôt be considered. Enter in the next week instead.
  11. Please also create a thread for your track under #tracks, like usual, if you wish.

‚ìôudging:
One winner chosen each week, or possibly a draw. Judging will be totally subjective. Please don‚Äôt ask why your track didn‚Äôt win. The judges alternate between: -

  • ICSleepers
  • Arimyth
  • Hydrans
  • AzureOnyx
  • Goxenar
  • Blakaz
  • DadMother
  • MisterMaster

The judge this week is‚Ä¶ MisterMaster.

‚ìürize

  • Winner gets a special icon next to their forum name.
  • Winner‚Äôs name is also listed in a winner‚Äôs thread.


*Logo created by @Arimyth

Read full topic
